original_text: In the five and twentieth year of our captivity, in the beginning of the year, in the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after that the city was smitten, in the selfsame day the hand of the Lord was upon me, and brought me thither.
korean_text: 우리가 사로잡힌 지 스물다섯째 해, 성이 함락된 후 열넷째 해 첫째 달 열째 날에 곧 그 날에 여호와의 권능이 내게 임하여 나를 데리고 이스라엘 땅으로 가시되

sentences.original_text: In the five and twentieth year of our captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 포로 된 지 이십오 년에

sentences.original_text: in the beginning of the year
in the tenth day of the month
in the fourteenth year after that the city was smitten
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성이 쳐진 후 십사 년에

sentences.original_text: the hand of the Lord was upon me
